description: Two years ago, Junichi Tachibana had his heart broken by a girl who stood him up on a date on Christmas Eve. Now a second-year student in high school, Junichi is wary of love because of his past and dislikes celebrating Christmas. However this Christmas, his encounter with one of six girls from his school: Haruka Morishima, Kaoru Tanamachi, Sae Nakata, Ai Nanasaki, Rihoko Sakurai, or Tsukasa Ayatsuji will finally open up his heart to love again.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Swimming
tags.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

title.native: アマガミSS イモウト
アマガミ ～すなおのそのあと～

node.description:
[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/konno-hiromi.html)

Hiromi Konno is a Japanese voice actress and narrator from Hokkaido. She graduated from Faculty of Economics at Sapporo University. After leaving Marcus and Aoni-juku she is now affiliated with Aoni Production.

__Height:__ 160 cm

__[Blog](http://blog.excite.co.jp/kamosan) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nazukakaori) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/nazuka_kaori424/)__

**Non-anime roles:**
• Robin - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
• Tsukishiro Yanagi - Zenless Zone Zero (VG)

__Height:__ 159cm
__Nicknames:__ いしずか (Ishizuka), 静様 (Shizuka-sama), (静) 御前 ("Shizuka" Gozen)

[Profile (Ken Production)](https://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/8) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/beerlover-shizuka/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shizuka_Itō) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/伊藤静)

She married on December 5, 2012, her 32nd birthday, but later announced her divorce on April 30, 2020.

She was part of the seiyuu unit with [Hitomi Nabatame](https://anilist.co/staff/95184/) called "Hitomi Nabatame to Shizuka Itou" (生天目仁美と伊藤静) under Geneon's cosmic★motion label. Together they are known by the name Hitoshizuku (ひとしずく).

Birthplace: Tokyo, Japan Website (artist page) Oomori Toshiyuki is a Japanese composer, arranger, pianist and musician.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/大塚舞)

Originating from [Shaft](https://anilist.co/studio/44/). Currently freelance.

Aspired to become an animator after having seen [Densetsu no Yuusha Da Garn](https://anilist.co/anime/2803/).

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

title.native: 神のみぞ知るセカイ 女神篇
ときめきメモリアル Only Love
青春ブタ野郎はバニーガール先輩の夢を見ない
シスター・プリンセス
ぼくたちは勉強ができない
俺の彼女と幼なじみが修羅場すぎる
冴えない彼女の育てかた
やはり俺の青春ラブコメはまちがっている。
負けヒロインが多すぎる！
